name: Piano Widget
label: Play Piano on Widget, LockScreen, Dynamic Island
maker_introduction:
📌
Piano Widget – Play Anytime, No Launch Needed! Designed for iPhone/iPad, this high-quality piano simulator is perfect for music lovers. With 15+ rich instrument tones, an immersive touch experience, and innovative widgets, you can play and learn freely-whenever inspiration strikes!

【Professional Piano Simulation】
• Full 88-key piano keyboard
• No ads, many features for free
• Haptic feedback for realistic touch response
• Multi-touch support: play chords, trills, and dynamic keystrokes
• Built-in Recording: Supports lossless recording in formats (m4a/mp3/wav), not to miss creative inspiration
• Metronome with customizable tempo, beat, and sound options
• Sing and play simultaneously—perfect for accompaniment

【15+ Stunning Instrument Tones】
• Classical Piano / C3 Grand Piano / Drawbar Organ / Pipe Organ / Xylophone
• Classical Guitar / Donny Guitar / Electric Guitar
• Guzheng / Tubular Bells / Mandolin / Shakuhachi
• Forest Flute / Flute / Woodwind
• Timpani / Realistic Choir / Cat Meow

【Creative Widgets】
• Home Screen Piano Widget – Play multiple keyboards with various sound effects
• Dynamic Island Piano – Play directly from the lock screen
• Quick Access – Open the piano instantly from the lock screen widget or Control Center

【Personalized Customization】
• Adjustable Key Size – 100+ precision levels to fit your touch
• Keystroke Effects – 24+ dynamic effects for an immersive playing experience
• Note Labels – CDE | DoReMi | 123 | 哆唻咪 | 宫商角 | 도레미 | ハニホ | SRG
• Minimalist Mode – Display note labels only on C keys for a clean interface
• Customizable Sound Levels – 10+ volume adjustments
• Vibration Feedback – Choose from light, soft, or strong

【More Features】
• Customizable app icons
• Widget fullscreen toggle
• Hidden Surprise – Tap the logo for a special Easter egg!

If you enjoy this app, don’t forget to support the developer! More features are on the way. For suggestions and feedback, feel free to reply here.
Upvote
(5)
Report
Share
1d ago
description: Play Anytime, No Launch Needed! Designed for iPhone/iPad, this high-quality piano simulator is perfect for music lovers. With 30+ rich instrument tones, an immersive touch experience, and innovative widgets, play and learn freely-whenever inspiration strikes!
label_zh: 在小组件、锁屏和灵动岛上弹钢琴
content_zh: 随时随地演奏，无需启动！这款专为iPhone/iPad设计的高品质钢琴模拟器非常适合音乐爱好者。它拥有30多种丰富的乐器音色、沉浸式的触控体验和创新的小工具，让你在灵感来临时可以自由地演奏和学习。

name: Naoma
label: Find your sales stars’ patterns and scale them
maker_introduction:
Hey Product Hunters! 👋

We’re thrilled to introduce Naoma.ai—your new secret weapon for supercharging sales conversations. 🚀

What is Naoma.ai?
Naoma connects directly to your CRM and evaluates each sales conversation against your custom sales scripts. It automatically highlights key moments—like client objections, competitor mentions, and critical questions—while serving up actionable recommendations to help you refine your pitch and boost revenue. 💡

Key Features:
• Seamless CRM Integration 🔗: Automatically pulls in your sales data to ensure every conversation is analyzed.
• Custom Sales Script Analysis 📝: Compares your calls against tailored scripts to pinpoint what’s working (and what’s not).
• Key Moment Detection ⏰: Flags client objections, competitor mentions, and pivotal questions in real time.
• Actionable Recommendations 🎯: Offers personalized tips to improve your sales interactions and close more deals.

Who’s It For?
Naoma.ai is built for sales teams, account executives, and revenue ops pros who want to gain deeper insights from their conversations without spending hours on manual analysis. Whether you’re a startup or an established enterprise, our tool is designed to empower you with data-driven strategies for success. 📈

Why Naoma?
Unlike other revenue intelligence solutions, Naoma is designed to develop sales representatives. Here’s how:
• Deep Communication Analysis – Naoma evaluates sales reps’ interactions with clients, not just at a high level but by thoroughly assessing their alignment with the company’s approved scripts.
• Personalized Client Engagement Recommendations – Naoma generates tailored recommendations for each client interaction, helping sales reps optimize their approach.
• Individual Development Plans – Naoma identifies each sales rep’s strengths and areas for growth, providing actionable insights and structured development plans.

By prioritizing sales reps’ growth, Naoma goes beyond revenue intelligence—it empowers teams to sell smarter and perform at their best.

We’d Love Your Feedback:
We’re here to learn from you! Let us know what works, what could be improved, or if there’s a dream feature you’d like to see. Your insights will help us evolve Naoma.ai to better serve your needs. 🔥

Thanks for checking out Naoma. We can’t wait to hear your thoughts! 😊

Cheers,
Dmitry Zakharov
Co-founder & CEO, Naoma
description: Meet Naoma - AI-powered sales conversation analytics that reveal what makes top reps succeed and help scale it. Naoma connects to your CRM, analyzes sales conversations, highlights key moments, and provides actionable recommendations for each sales rep.
label_zh: 找到你的销售明星的模式并进行扩展
content_zh: 认识一下Naoma——这是一个由AI驱动的销售对话分析工具，它能揭示顶尖销售代表成功的秘诀，并帮助你将这些成功经验推广开来。Naoma可以连接到你的CRM系统，分析销售对话，突出关键时刻，并为每位销售代表提供具体的改进建议。

name: illustration.app
label: Create custom vector illustrations in seconds
maker_introduction:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

I’m so excited (and a little nervous!) to finally launch IllustraAI here!

A little backstory — I’m an indie hacker who loves design. Over the past few years, I’ve built several projects, and one thing I kept running into was the struggle to find good, custom illustrations. Stock images felt too generic, custom artwork was often expensive, and I didn’t always have the time (or skill!) to create my own.

That’s when the idea for IllustraAI hit me. What if there was a faster, easier way to get high-quality, unique vector illustrations — tailored exactly to your needs — just by describing what you wanted?

So I built it! With IllustraAI, you can generate beautiful, scalable SVG illustrations in seconds — perfect for websites, apps, marketing materials, and more. No more digging through endless stock libraries or paying a fortune for custom work.

This project has been a labor of love, and seeing it go from a simple idea to a real product people actually use has been incredible. I’d love to hear what you think! If you have any feedback, ideas, or just want to say hi, drop a comment — I’ll be here all day.

Thank you so much for your support! 💜

— Evan
description: illustration.app is a powerful vector graphics generator that allows you to create stunning, scalable illustrations in seconds. Perfect for websites, apps, and marketing materials.
label_zh: 几秒钟内创建自定义矢量插图
content_zh: illustration.app 是一个强大的矢量图形生成器，可以在几秒钟内创建出令人惊艳且可缩放的插图。非常适合用于网站、应用程序和营销材料。

name: TimeDive
label: Guess year and place, explore and have fun
maker_introduction:
📌
Hi everyone!

TimeDive started as a passion project to make history feel engaging, competitive, and fun. I wanted to create a game that challenges players to test their knowledge of historical events in a multiplayer setting, where they can battle for the highest score while learning something new.

Here’s what makes TimeDive unique:
✅ Multiplayer Battles – Compete with friends to see who has the sharpest sense of location and time. 
✅ Solo Mode – Sharpen your skills and challenge yourself with endless rounds.
✅ Daily Challenge - 3 new images everyday to keep it interesting!

💡 I’d love to hear your thoughts! What features would you love to see next? Your feedback will help shape the future of TimeDive. 

Currently only available in iOS but working on the android version, please be patient guys! 😁

Thanks for checking it out, and if you enjoy it, an upvote would mean the world! 🚀🔥

Huge shoutout to Davide Acosta and Gina Troiani for helping me develop the UI and UX for the app!

- Miguel Acosta Del Vecchio
Upvote
Report
Share
2d ago
description: How to Play: 1) Examine the given image carefully - spot signs, buildings, and details that reveal its location and time period. 2) Pin the right place on the map 3) Guess the correct year (Anywhere between 1900 and 2025) 4) Score points based on accuracy!
label_zh: 猜年份和地点，探索并享受乐趣
content_zh:
如何玩：
1) 仔细观察给出的图片，注意其中的标志、建筑物和细节，这些可以揭示图片的地点和时间。
2) 在地图上标记正确的位置。
3) 猜出正确的年份（范围在1900年至2025年之间）。
4) 根据准确度得分。
